Posts.Content: Denise....been walking through it for almost 4 years. Spread to various parts of the bones. I feel and look great.............. Came through chemo/radiation with flying colors, how? Many, many prayers plus nutrition and supplements. Have been to various holistic as well as regular medical doctors. Since it has spread again I just came off my drug...obviously it worked for awhile and is not now. I may go back............... I am trying to avoid sugar and meats, working with an herbalist and with Times of Refreshing...--- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, url removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ----in Blairsville, GA (jucing, eating raw salads esp. sprouts and "fever baths" which I get my temp up to 101.2 degress for almost 10 minutes in the hot tub/bath and then under covers for another 10 minutes. Cancer cells can not grow in this heat. Doing colonics to keep my colon clean. I am now about to start with foot reflexogoy and hope to start Vit. C IV............ Need to find info on how to purchase so I can this at home since I do have a port. ANY HELP?............... Spiritually, I am in a warfare. Remember the enmey is a 'thief'. What do we do when someone breaks into our home. We call for help, get mad and say how dare they, they invaded my privacy, they have no right, etc. We put up new locks etc. I feel the same way about the enemy as I would a house invader. Well, I'm fighting him with the Scriptures and my words that I have good cells, bones, will get a new breast, etc. Listen to Gloria Copeland's Healing School tapes. Feed yourself God's WORD. Need help? --- Message edited by CancerCompass staff: for personal protection, phone number removed. Please review CancerCompass Member Guidelines at http://www.cancercompass.com/common/guidelines.html ---- Do I still with pain, you betcha, just had two hard weeks even while still runing my B&B. But I'm up and kicking again mentality, physically, spiritualy and emotionally.
